channel.title: CLI on Frank in seattle
channel.description: Recent content in CLI on Frank in seattle

item.title: 7z 命令行使用
item.description: 7z 命令行基本语法为 1 7z <command> [<switch>...] <base_archive_name> [<arguments>...] 通配符 *.txt: means all files with an extension of “.txt” ?a*: means all files with a second character of “a” *1*: means all names that contains character “1” *.*.*: means all names that contain two at least “.” characters commands l (List) 列出压缩文件中的所有内容 1 7z l archive.zip a (Add) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 7z a -tzip archive.
